name: Scifi Thing
description:
Travel through a mysterious yet dangerous city in your spaceship... Controls

Right click to move forward

Left click to shoot

WASD control, W points down and S points it upwards lol

R for reload 

was going to add random glitches to 2d birds eye view and proc gen buildings n enemy spawn but ran out of time

Download pc game2/ mac 2
